definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Avoid shock loading and high overloads during mill operation.
sentences.chinese: 軋鋼時，避免衝擊負荷及過負荷運作。

sentences.english: At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，醫院繼續採取服務收費的運作模式。
今天，在九十八個國家運作。

sentences.english: Yes, I was last year formal abdication comes down to run Hefei group to buy a network.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是去年正式辭職下來運作合肥團購網的。

sentences.english: Signification, on the other hand, comes into play in the Vorstellung.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，真實意義是在觀念的領域運作。

sentences.english: Thus, in the ordinary course of warehousing, the temptations to embezzle are strictly limited.
sentences.chinese: 所以在普通倉庫的運作中，侵佔的誘惑被嚴格限制了。
“因陀羅的標槍”經過一個圓形的“反射體”而運作。

sentences.english: In theory, Whitehall officials and ministers back in London oversaw the empire.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上說，倫敦白廳官員與部長們監視帝國運作。

sentences.english: The new legislation would have operated under a "three strikes" system.
sentences.chinese: 新的立法將在“事不過三”體系下運作。

sentences.english: Able to operate in a matrix management structure.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉矩陣式管理結構下的運作。

sentences.english: The close-ended fund meets the serious challenge on the securities market.
sentences.chinese: 封閉式基金在證券市場的運作上遇到嚴重的挑戰。

sentences.english: The platforms are operated using Advanced Ceramics Research’s integrated ground station.
sentences.chinese: 該平臺採用先進陶瓷研究公司的綜合地面站運作。

sentences.english: Does such an administration operate within the political system, or supplant it?
sentences.chinese: 這種管治是在既有政制中運作，抑或另起爐竈？

sentences.english: The light will move through the meridians and cells allowing for the act of regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 光將會通過經絡和細胞運作，從而允許再生行爲發生。

sentences.english: The workings of the incentive mechanism are based on priority-based reward system.
sentences.chinese: 這種激勵機制是通過基於優先權的報酬系統來運作的。

sentences.english: But if we work viscosity, all is changed.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們運作黏性，一切都隨之改變。

definition: running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc)/(fig.) to function/to be in operation/(of a train service etc) to operate/to run/(of a computer) to run
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
